directions:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a large, shallow baking dish.

Arrange flounder fillets on prepared baking dish and brush with 1 tablespoon butter. Combine remaining 3 tablespoons butter with bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, and thyme in a bowl; sprinkle over flounder.

Bake in preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes. Carefully transfer fillets to a plate with a spatula.

Arrange flounder fillets on prepared baking dish and brush with 1 tablespoon butter. Combine remaining 3 tablespoons butter with bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, and thyme in a bowl; sprinkle over flounder.

Bake in preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes. Carefully transfer fillets to a plate with a spatula.
html.ingredients: 4 (4 ounce) flounder fillets 1/4 cup butter, melted 2/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese 1 cup panko bread crumbs 1/2 teaspoon salt ground black pepper to taste 1 pinch dried thyme
html.nutrition: Per Serving: 331 calories; 17.6 g fat; 19.6 g carbohydrates; 29.2 g protein; 102 mg cholesterol; 800 mg sodium. Full nutrition

ingredients:
4 (4 ounce) flounder fillets
1/4 cup butter, melted
2/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese
1 cup panko bread crumbs
1/2 teaspoon salt
ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch dried thyme
name: Baked Flounder with Panko and Parmesan
nutritional_info: Per Serving: 331 calories; 17.6 g fat; 19.6 g carbohydrates; 29.2 g protein; 102 mg cholesterol; 800 mg sodium. Full nutrition
